```js
class CurrencyTextFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: 0 };
    this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this);
  }

  handleChange(e, value) {
    this.setState({ value });
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <IntlProvider locale="en">
        <React.Fragment>
          <CurrencyTextField
            currency="USD"
            value={this.state.value}
            onChange={this.handleChange}
          />
          <p>Value: {this.state.value}</p>
        </React.Fragment>
      </IntlProvider>
    );
  }
}

<CurrencyTextFieldExample />;
```
